name: Drift.Wav
description:
This is a game all about relaxing and hitting some cool drifts. Try the different modes and drift your way to the top of leaderboard, if you can...
Drift or drive to earn cash and save up for one of the 6 cars to choose from—one of them being a little more unique than usual. Also, there are several built-in playlists that you can select and drift to in any mode!

Controls

  • W / S to go and stop
  • A / D to turn
  • F or SPACE to jump
  • T to get unstuck (must have one wheel off and below 50mph)
  • R to reset
  • C to swap between camera angles
  • L SHIFT to activate slo-motion
  • L CTRL to activate ABS / traction control ( Tightens up the car a little )

Custom Playlists

In addition, there is a custom playlist feature that allows you to drift to any playlist you want while watching the visual waveforms of the song move around you!
This feature is currently being worked on to improve usability. But for now you will need to convert any songs into a .wav format and drop them into the prompted folder when in-game.
